00021 #ifndef _ENVIRONMENT_H
00022 #define _ENVIRONMENT_H
00023 
00024 
00025 /* Define some default values
00026  */
00027 #define VERBOSITY 1
00028 #define LOGFILE "/tmp/iipsrv.log"
00029 #define MAX_IMAGE_CACHE_SIZE 10.0
00030 #define FILENAME_PATTERN "_pyr_"
00031 #define JPEG_QUALITY 75
00032 #define MAX_CVT 5000
00033 #define LAYERS 1
00034 #define FILESYSTEM_PREFIX ""
00035 
00036 #include <string>
00037 
00038 
00040 class Environment {
00041 
00042  public:
00043 
00044   static int getVerbosity(){
00045     int loglevel = VERBOSITY;
00046     char *envpara = getenv( "VERBOSITY" );
00047     if( envpara ){
00048       loglevel = atoi( envpara );
00049       // If not a realistic level, set to zero
00050       if( loglevel < 0 ) loglevel = 0;
00051     }
00052     return loglevel;
00053   }
00054 
00055 
00056   static std::string getLogFile(){
00057     char* envpara = getenv( "LOGFILE" );
00058     if( envpara ) return std::string( envpara );
00059     else return LOGFILE;
00060   }
00061 
00062 
00063   static float getMaxImageCacheSize(){
00064     float max_image_cache_size = MAX_IMAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
00065     char* envpara = getenv( "MAX_IMAGE_CACHE_SIZE" );
00066     if( envpara ){
00067       max_image_cache_size = atof( envpara );
00068     }
00069     return max_image_cache_size;
00070   }
00071 
00072 
00073   static std::string getFileNamePattern(){
00074     char* envpara = getenv( "FILENAME_PATTERN" );
00075     std::string filename_pattern;
00076     if( envpara ){
00077       filename_pattern = std::string( envpara );
00078     }
00079     else filename_pattern = FILENAME_PATTERN;
00080 
00081     return filename_pattern;
00082   }
00083 
00084 
00085   static int getJPEGQuality(){
00086     char* envpara = getenv( "JPEG_QUALITY" );
00087     int jpeg_quality;
00088     if( envpara ){
00089       jpeg_quality = atoi( envpara );
00090       if( jpeg_quality > 100 ) jpeg_quality = 100;
00091       if( jpeg_quality < 1 ) jpeg_quality = 1;
00092     }
00093     else jpeg_quality = JPEG_QUALITY;
00094 
00095     return jpeg_quality;
00096   }
00097 
00098 
00099   static int getMaxCVT(){
00100     char* envpara = getenv( "MAX_CVT" );
00101     int max_CVT;
00102     if( envpara ){
00103       max_CVT = atoi( envpara );
00104       if( max_CVT < 64 ) max_CVT = 64;
00105       if( max_CVT == -1 ) max_CVT = -1;
00106     }
00107     else max_CVT = MAX_CVT;
00108 
00109     return max_CVT;
00110   }
00111 
00112 
00113   static int getLayers(){
00114     char* envpara = getenv( "LAYERS" );
00115     int layers;
00116     if( envpara ) layers = atoi( envpara );
00117     else layers = LAYERS;
00118 
00119     return layers;
00120   }
00121 
00122 
00123   static std::string getFileSystemPrefix(){
00124     char* envpara = getenv( "FILESYSTEM_PREFIX" );
00125     std::string filesystem_prefix; 
00126     if( envpara ){ 
00127       filesystem_prefix = std::string( envpara ); 
00128     } 
00129     else filesystem_prefix = FILESYSTEM_PREFIX; 
00130 
00131     return filesystem_prefix;
00132   }
00133 
00134 };
00135 
00136 
00137 #endif
